TEXT.TITLE: UNITED MEDICAL <UM> TO SELL UNIT
TEXT.BODY: United Medical Corp said it has reached a definitive agreement to sell its hospital distribution unit to <Myriad Group Inc> for undisclosed terms, with closing expected in the next several weeks. Reuter
